revised_title: Invariant Lagrangian Theory of Poisson Brackets for Systems with Constraints
tldr: This article presents a new and improved universal theory of the Poisson bracket for Lagrangian dynamical systems with complicated constraint structures. The author introduces a simple coordinate-invariant system of simultaneous linear algebraic equations to calculate the Poisson bracket and its Fermi-Dirac counterpart. The new formalism is more efficient and has better properties of consistency, coordinate invariance, motion invariance, and gauge invariance compared to previous approaches.
